stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

 

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Briefly describe one way that one Native American society adapted to its environment prior to European contact.

  2. Briefly explain one similarity in how Native American societies in two regions adapted to European contact from 1492 to 1763.

  3. Briefly explain one difference in how Native American societies in two regions adapted to European contact from 1492 to 1763.
